articles.author: Marisa Wexler, MS
articles.title: Ancient DNA reveal how MS risk genes spread across Europe - Multiple Sclerosis News Today
articles.description: Genetic changes that predispose people to developing MS first emerged among herding groups in eastern Europe thousands of years ago, a study says.
articles.content: Genetic changes that predispose people to developing multiple sclerosis (MS) first emerged among herding populations who migrated to Eastern Europe thousands of years ago and then spread across the c… [+4695 chars]
